review.title: “terrible company to work for”
review.pros: Pros – interesting business model; was able to learn a lot since company ran very lean; wore many hats and experienced lots of challenges
review.cons: Cons – horrible CEO who makes sexist comments, thinks that yelling at people is good management; terrible pay, dishonest practices
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get a new CEO and stick with a solid business plan
